author: senh
title: Books on autism, technology up for Samuel Johnson Prize
text: BING NEWS: Books on autism, technology up for Samuel Johnson Prize LONDON (AP) — Two provocative books about the brain are among six finalists for Britain's leading literary award for nonfiction.
